text: Ngati iwe ukudabwa, zodabwitsa kwambiri ndi mawu awo oti, “Ife tikadzakhala dothi, kodi tidzalengedwanso kwatsopano?” Amenewa ndiwo sadakhulupirire Ambuye wawo. Iwo ndiwo amene adzakhala ndi unyolo wa zitsulo umene udzamangiriridwa manja ku makosi awo. Amenewo ndi anthu akumoto ndipo iwo adzakhalako mpaka kalekale
